text: Bruce Beall (born October 20, 1951) is an American rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for the United States Category:Rowers at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Rowers at the 1979 Pan American Games
title: Bruce Beall
